001package src.pkg_game;
002import src.pkg_commands.Parser;
003import src.pkg_rooms.Room;
004import src.pkg_items.*;
005import src.pkg_models.*;
006import src.pkg_rooms.TransporterRoom;
007import src.pkg_commands.Command;
008import src.pkg_commands.QuitCommand;
009import src.pkg_commands.EatCommand;
010import src.pkg_commands.CommandWord;
011import src.pkg_commands.UnknownCommand;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.HashMap;
016
017/**
018 * This class represents the core engine of the game, responsible for managing game elements such as rooms, items, and characters.
019 * It processes player commands and controls the flow of the game.
020 * 
021 * @author Pierre MATAR
022 */
023
024public class GameEngine
025{
026    private Parser aParser;
027    private UserInterface aGui;
028    private Player aPlayer;
029    private boolean aRestartGame;
030    private List<Room> aRooms;
031    private Room aAleaRoom;
032    private boolean aIsTestMode;
033    private ItemList aItemsToEat;
034    private Item aMagicCookie, aThePC;
035    private List<Characterr> aCharacters;
036    
037
038/**
039     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
040     */
041  public GameEngine(final String pPlayerName)
042    {
043        this.aParser = new Parser(this);
044        this.aPlayer = new Player(pPlayerName);
045        this.aRooms = new ArrayList<Room>();
046        this.aItemsToEat = new ItemList();
047        this.aCharacters = new ArrayList<Characterr>();
048        this.createRoomsWithConfiguration();
049  
050    }
051     /**
052     * Initializes the user interface and displays the welcome message.
053     * @param pUserInterface The user interface for the game.
054     */
055    
056       public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
057    {
058        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
059        this.printWelcome();
060       
061    }
062    
063     /**
064     * @return The UserInterface object.
065     */
066    
067    public UserInterface getGui() {
068        return this.aGui;
069    }
070    
071    /**
072     * @return The Parser object.
073     */
074    
075    public Parser getParser() {
076        return this.aParser;
077    }
078        /**
079 * Creates the different rooms with their configuration (exits / items / characters).
080 */
081
082    private void createRoomsWithConfiguration() 
083    {
084        
085    HashMap<String, Item> vItems = this.createItems();
086    HashMap<String, Characterr> vCharacters = this.createCharacters(vItems);
087    
088    Room hall, developerRoom, serverRoom, meetingRoom, cafeteria, projectManagerOffice, openSpace, presentationRoom, wc, maintenanceRoom;
089    
090    hall = new TransporterRoom("hall", "in The entry hall.", "assets/images/Hall.jpg");
091    developerRoom = new TransporterRoom("production","inside the developer room.", "assets/images/Developer.jpg");
092    serverRoom = new TransporterRoom("server","inside the server room.", "assets/images/Server.jpg");
093    meetingRoom = new TransporterRoom("meeting","inside the meeting room.", "assets/images/Meeting.jpg");
094    cafeteria = new TransporterRoom("cafeteria","inside the cafeteria,", "assets/images/Cafeteria.jpg");
095    projectManagerOffice = new TransporterRoom("projectManagerOffice", "inside the project manager office.", "assets/images/ProjectManager.jpg", true, this);
096    openSpace = new TransporterRoom("openSpace","inside the open-space", "assets/images/OpenSpace.jpg");
097    presentationRoom = new TransporterRoom("presentation","inside the presenting room", "assets/images/Presentation.jpg");
098    wc = new TransporterRoom("wc","In the toilet...", "assets/images/Wc.jpg");
099    maintenanceRoom = new TransporterRoom("maintenance","inside the maintenance room.", "assets/images/Maintenance.jpg");
100 
101    
102    
103    hall.setExit("North", null);
104    hall.setExit("South", null);
105    hall.setExit("East", null);
106    hall.setExit("West", null);
107    hall.setExit("Up", openSpace);
108    hall.setExit("Down", null);
109    hall.addItem(vItems.get("apple"));
110    hall.addItem(vItems.get("welcomeNote"));
111    hall.addItem(vItems.get("trelloTask"));
112    hall.addCharacter(vCharacters.get("Christy"));
113
114    developerRoom.setExit("North", projectManagerOffice);
115    developerRoom.setExit("South", null);
116    developerRoom.setExit("East", null);
117    developerRoom.setExit("West", serverRoom);
118    developerRoom.setExit("Up", null);
119    developerRoom.setExit("Down", meetingRoom);
120    developerRoom.addCharacter(vCharacters.get("Jeremy"));
121
122
123 
124    serverRoom.setExit("North", null);
125    serverRoom.setExit("South", maintenanceRoom);
126    serverRoom.setExit("East", developerRoom, false, null, true);
127    serverRoom.setExit("West", null);
128    serverRoom.setExit("Up", null);
129    serverRoom.setExit("Down", null);
130    serverRoom.addItem(this.aMagicCookie);
131    serverRoom.addItem(this.aPlayer.getBeamer());
132
133    
134    meetingRoom.setExit("North", null);
135    meetingRoom.setExit("South", null);
136    meetingRoom.setExit("East", openSpace);
137    meetingRoom.setExit("West", null);
138    meetingRoom.setExit("Up", developerRoom, true, vItems.get("key"), false);
139    meetingRoom.setExit("Down", null);
140    meetingRoom.addCharacter(vCharacters.get("Rim"));
141    meetingRoom.addItem(vItems.get("juice"));
142    
143
144    
145    cafeteria.setExit("North", presentationRoom, true, vItems.get("keyCard"), false);
146    cafeteria.setExit("South", null);
147    cafeteria.setExit("East", null);
148    cafeteria.setExit("West", openSpace);
149    cafeteria.setExit("Up", null);
150    cafeteria.setExit("Down", wc);
151    cafeteria.addItem(vItems.get("roastBeef"));
152
153
154   
155    projectManagerOffice.setExit("North", null);
156    projectManagerOffice.setExit("South", developerRoom);
157    projectManagerOffice.setExit("East", null);
158    projectManagerOffice.setExit("West", null);
159    projectManagerOffice.setExit("Up", null);
160    projectManagerOffice.setExit("Down", null);
161    projectManagerOffice.addItem(vItems.get("keyCard"));
162    projectManagerOffice.addCharacter(vCharacters.get("Mathieu"));
163    ((MovingCharacter) vCharacters.get("Mathieu")).setRoom(projectManagerOffice);
164
165    
166    openSpace.setExit("North", null);
167    openSpace.setExit("South", null);
168    openSpace.setExit("East", cafeteria);
169    openSpace.setExit("West", meetingRoom);
170    openSpace.setExit("Up", null);
171    openSpace.setExit("Down", hall);
172    openSpace.addItem(vItems.get("postIt"));
173    openSpace.addItem(vItems.get("laptop"));
174
175    
176    presentationRoom.setExit("North", null);
177    presentationRoom.setExit("South", cafeteria);
178    presentationRoom.setExit("East", null);
179    presentationRoom.setExit("West", null);
180    presentationRoom.setExit("Up", null);
181    presentationRoom.setExit("Down", null);
182    presentationRoom.addItem(vItems.get("coffee"));
183    presentationRoom.addItem(this.aThePC);
184
185   
186    wc.setExit("North", null);
187    wc.setExit("South", null);
188    wc.setExit("East", null);
189    wc.setExit("West", null);
190    wc.setExit("Up", cafeteria);
191    wc.setExit("Down", null);
192    wc.addItem(vItems.get("toothbrush"));
193    wc.addItem(vItems.get("key"));
194    
195    maintenanceRoom.setExit("North", serverRoom);
196    maintenanceRoom.setExit("South", null);
197    maintenanceRoom.setExit("East", null);
198    maintenanceRoom.setExit("West", null);
199    maintenanceRoom.setExit("Up", null);
200    maintenanceRoom.setExit("Down", null);
201    maintenanceRoom.addItem(vItems.get("toolbox"));
202    maintenanceRoom.addItem(vItems.get("kebab"));
203    
204
205    
206    this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(hall);
207    this.aPlayer.addRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
208    
209     this.aRooms.addAll(Arrays.asList(
210            hall,
211            presentationRoom,
212            wc,
213            maintenanceRoom,
214            openSpace,
215            projectManagerOffice,
216            cafeteria,
217            meetingRoom,
218            serverRoom,
219            developerRoom
220        ));
221} // createRooms
222
223/**
224 * Create all items needed for the game.
225 */
226private HashMap<String, Item> createItems() {
227       
228    HashMap<String, Item> vItems = new HashMap<String, Item>();
229    
230    Item welcomeNote = new Item("welcomeNote", "Hi, " + this.aPlayer.getName() + ".\nThe goal of FixIt is very simple : find your PC and fix the bug with the fix command !", 20);
231    Item apple = new Item("apple", "An apple to give you the strength for this adventure", 150);
232    Item key = new Item("key", "key to open the developers room", 100);
233    Item juice = new Item("juice", "An orange juice", 50);
234    Item roastBeef = new Item("roastBeef", "a roastBeef for Rim", 220);
235    Item kebab = new Item("kebab", "kebab menu from Berlin", 300);
236    Item coffee = new Item("coffee", "drink this coffee", 100);
237    Item postIt = new Item("postIt", "hello " + this.aPlayer.getName() + ", how are you today ?", 20);
238    Item toothbrush = new Item("toothbrush", "do you want to clean your theeth ?", 40);
239    Item magicCookie = new Item("magicCookie", "THE magic cookie !", 0);
240    Item thePC = new Item("thePC", "the holy grail", 500);
241    Beamer beamer = new Beamer("beamer", "the transporter room !", 300);
242    Item keyCard = new Item("keyCard", "keyCard to go in the presentation room", 250);
243    Item trelloTask = new Item("trelloTask", "final task : Fix the bug in the FixIt project", 70);
244    Item  toolbox = new Item("toolbox", "a toolBox with severals tools...", 250);
245    Item laptop = new Item("laptop", "ohh nooo, this is not your PC !", 210);
246    
247    vItems.put(welcomeNote.getName(), welcomeNote);
248    vItems.put(apple.getName(), apple);
249    vItems.put(key.getName(), key);
250    vItems.put(juice.getName(), juice);
251    vItems.put(roastBeef.getName(), roastBeef);
252    vItems.put(kebab.getName(), kebab);
253    vItems.put(coffee.getName(), coffee);
254    vItems.put(postIt.getName(), postIt);
255    vItems.put(toothbrush.getName(), toothbrush);
256    vItems.put(magicCookie.getName(), magicCookie);
257    vItems.put(thePC.getName(), thePC);
258    vItems.put(beamer.getName(), beamer);
259    vItems.put(keyCard.getName(), keyCard);
260    vItems.put(trelloTask.getName(), trelloTask);
261    vItems.put(toolbox.getName(), toolbox);
262    vItems.put(laptop.getName(), laptop);
263    
264    this.aMagicCookie = magicCookie;
265    this.aThePC = thePC;
266    
267    this.aPlayer.setBeamer(beamer);
268    
269    this.aItemsToEat.addItem(magicCookie);
270    this.aItemsToEat.addItem(apple);
271    this.aItemsToEat.addItem(juice);
272    this.aItemsToEat.addItem(coffee);
273    this.aItemsToEat.addItem(kebab);
274    this.aItemsToEat.addItem(roastBeef);
275   
276
277    return vItems;
278    
279} //createItems
280
281/**
282 * Create all characters needed for the game.
283 * @param pItems the items to add to chracters if needed.
284 */
285private HashMap<String, Characterr> createCharacters(final HashMap<String, Item> pItems) {
286    HashMap<String, Characterr> vCharacters = new HashMap<String, Characterr>();
287    
288    Characterr vChristy = new Characterr("Christy", "Welcome to Webtech, have a nice day !", null, null);
289    Characterr vRim = new Characterr("Rim", "I'm hungry I want my roast beef please", "Miammmmmmm so good, thank u very much !", pItems.get("roastBeef"));
290    MovingCharacter vMathieu = new MovingCharacter("Mathieu", "Hi, I'm the project manager.", "Maybe you can find your PC in the presentation room.", pItems.get("trelloTask"));
291    Characterr vJeremy = new Characterr("Jeremy", "Hello, I'm a senior full stack developer, do you want some help ?", "You can solve the problem on your PC with the string 'bug'", pItems.get("laptop"));
292
293
294    vCharacters.put(vRim.getName(), vRim);
295    vCharacters.put(vChristy.getName(), vChristy);
296    vCharacters.put(vMathieu.getName(), vMathieu);  
297    vCharacters.put(vJeremy.getName(), vJeremy);
298       
299   
300    this.aCharacters.addAll(Arrays.asList(vRim, vChristy, vMathieu, vJeremy));
301    
302    return vCharacters;
303} //createCharacters
304
305 /**
306* @return List of rooms.
307*/
308
309public List<Room> getRooms() {
310    return this.aRooms;
311}
312
313    /**
314     * @return List of characters.
315     */
316    
317public List<Characterr> getCharacters() {
318    return this.aCharacters;
319}
320
321    /**
322     * @return The PC item.
323     */
324    
325public Item getThePC() {
326    return this.aThePC;
327}
328
329/**  
330* @return The magic cookie item.
331*/
332
333public Item getMagicCookie() {
334    return this.aMagicCookie;
335}
336    
337    /**
338 * Displays the welcome message to the player.
339 */
340    private void printWelcome() {
341        this.aGui.println("Welcome " + this.aPlayer.getName().toUpperCase() + " to FixIt");
342        this.aGui.println("World of Zuul is a new, incredibly boring adventure game.");
343        this.aGui.println("Type 'help' if you need help. \n");
344        this.printLocationInfo();
345    } //printWelcome
346
347    /**
348 * Displays the current room's description and its image.
349 */
350
351    
352    public void printLocationInfo() {
353        Room vRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom();
354        this.aGui.println(vRoom.getLongDescription());
355        if ( vRoom.getImageName() != null )
356            this.aGui.showImage( vRoom.getImageName() );
357        
358        
359    } //printLocationInfo
360    
361   /**
362     * @return The alea room.
363     */
364    public Room getAleaRoom() {
365        return this.aAleaRoom;
366    }
367    
368   
369 
370 /**
371 * Sets the test mode flag for the game.
372 * 
373 * @param pBool True if the game is in test mode, false otherwise.
374 */
375
376public void setTestMode(final boolean pBool) {
377    this.aIsTestMode = pBool;
378}
379
380 /**
381 * Checks if the game is in test mode.
382 * 
383 * @return True if the game is in test mode, false otherwise.
384 */
385    
386
387public boolean isTestMode() {
388    return this.aIsTestMode;
389}
390
391 /**
392 * Sets the alea room used in the game.
393 * 
394 * @param pRoom The alea room.
395 */
396
397public void setAleaRoom(final Room pRoom) {
398    this.aAleaRoom = pRoom;
399}
400
401 /**
402 * Interprets and executes a given command line string.
403 * If the command ends the game, the game terminates.
404 * 
405 * @param pCommandLine The command line string entered by the player.
406 */
407    public void interpretCommand( final String pCommandLine ) 
408    {
409        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCommandLine );
410
411        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand( pCommandLine);
412        
413   
414        if ( vCommand instanceof UnknownCommand ) {
415    
416            if (this.aRestartGame) {
417                String vSecondWord = vCommand.getSecondWord();
418
419                if (vSecondWord == null || !vSecondWord.equals("yes")) this.invokeQuitCommand(false);
420                else {
421                    this.aGui.closeWindow();
422                    new Game();
423                    
424                }
425            }
426            else {
427                this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
428                
429            }
430            return;
431        }
432        
433        if (this.aPlayer.isNbMaxMovesReached()) {
434            this.aGui.println("you've reached the maximum number of attempts ( " + this.aPlayer.getMaxMoves() + " )... ");
435            this.invokeQuitCommand(true);
436            return;
437        }
438        
439        vCommand.execute(this.aPlayer, this);
440        this.aPlayer.addOneMove();
441}
442    
443    /**
444     * @return a list of items eatable.
445     */
446    
447    public ItemList getItemsToEat() {
448        return this.aItemsToEat;
449    }
450        
451    /**
452     * Allow to quit the game.
453     * @param false to quit immediately, true to ask to restart the game.
454     */
455    
456    private void invokeQuitCommand(final boolean pShouldRestart) {
457        
458            QuitCommand vQuitCommand = (QuitCommand) CommandWord.QUIT.getCommand();
459            vQuitCommand.setState(pShouldRestart);
460            vQuitCommand.execute(this.aPlayer, this);
461           
462        }
463
464    
465      /**
466     * @return True if the game is ready to restart, false otherwise.
467     */
468    
469    public boolean getRestartGame() {
470        return this.aRestartGame;
471    }
472    
473      /**
474     * Sets the restart game flag.
475     * 
476     * @param pBool True if the game should restart, false otherwise.
477     */
478    
479    public void setRestartGame(final boolean pBool) {
480        this.aRestartGame = pBool;
481    }
